00015 double etime() //
00016 {
00017         static double last_clock = 0;
00018         static double now_time = 0;
00019         last_clock = now_time;
00020         now_time = (double) clock();
00021         return (double) (now_time - last_clock) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00022 }
